EmailTemplate.name: Special Case Approval USTR
EmailTemplate.subject: Special Case Approval USTR
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
In accordance with E.O. 12591, 52 Fed. Reg. 13414 (1987), this is a request for concurrence from the United States Trade Representative for the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) to engage in a CRADA for the project described below. If you require any additional
information, please contact tpo@nist.gov.
Name, title and agency of individual requesting the CRADA: Paul R. Zielinski, Director of Technology Partnerships Office, NIST/Department of Commerce.
Type of Agreement (CRADA, MTA, CRADA-MT[R], NDA, etc.) or patent license agreement (PLA):{!Agreement__c.Agreement_Type__c}
Name and Type of CRADA Partner (i.e., corporation, institution, university, etc.):{!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c}, {!Agreement__c.Account_Country__c}, [Collaborator Type].
Short description of the purpose of the {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Type__c}: {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Title__c}.
Thank you for your attention to this request. If you require any additional information, please contact tpo@nist.gov.
